fileSamples.statement: (CONS : WCore.is_cons G_t) : irreflexive (hb_s ⨾ eco_s^?).
fileSamples.proofString:

rewrite hb_helper; eauto.
rewrite irreflexive_union.
split.
apply sb_irr; eauto.
rewrite monoton_rhb_sub.
arewrite (rhb_t ≡ restr_rel E_t rhb_t).
rewrite restr_relE.
now rewrite (wf_rhbE WF_t) at 1.
apply collect_rel_irr_inj; auto.
rewrite restr_relE, <- (wf_rhbE WF_t).
arewrite (rhb_t ⊆ hb_t ⨾ eco_t^?); [| apply CONS].
rewrite rhb_in_hb.
basic_solver.
apply (rhb_eco_irr_equiv WF_s).

rewrite <- collect_rel_seq;      [| eapply inj_dom_mori; eauto; red; basic_solver].
arewrite (      (⦗E_t⦘ ⨾ rhb_t ⨾ ⦗E_t⦘) ⨾ ⦗E_t⦘ ⨾ eco_t ⨾ ⦗E_t⦘ ⊆        restr_rel E_t (rhb_t ⨾ eco_t)    ).
rewrite !seqA.
basic_solver.
apply collect_rel_irr_inj; auto.
arewrite (restr_rel E_t (rhb_t ⨾ eco_t) ⊆ rhb_t ⨾ eco_t).
arewrite (rhb_t ⨾ eco_t ⊆ hb_t ⨾ eco_t^?); [| apply CONS].
rewrite rhb_in_hb.
basic_solver.

rewrite wf_frE; eauto.
basic_solver.
assert (IN2 : dom_rel co_t ⊆₁ E_t).
rewrite wf_coE; eauto.
basic_solver.
rewrite IN1, IN2.
basic_solver.
